Check the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMDMO/DM+Handbook\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"DM Handbook\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"! It is a consolidation of \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"practical\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-underlined\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" patterns and best practices for solving typical problems on a project. It will help to deliver successfully, thus building long-term trust relations with the customer in different situations:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"start of a new project - how to set it up to ensure great results in the future\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"stable project already running - how to make it even better\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"project in red status - how to fix and improve\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Every article in the Handbook has real proof, from real projects, by real people. Similarly, the core benefit of the Handbook is that it gives not only generic advice but also how that can/should/must be used within the EPAM ecosystem and processes.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"NOTE: The Handbook IS NOT another PAL or PMBOK, but rather a guideline with “Recommended next steps” or “What options are available” in a certain situation on a project. Got a problem? Check available options in the appropriate Handbook article - and go ahead to apply the most applicable recommendations depending on your project context.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Content in the DM Handbook is categorized by several parameters so that you can easily find the most relevant information you etc.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Project other dimensions like Project area, Team size etc.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Part of the Handbook is devoted to management based on JIRA:\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMDMO/JIRA+Guide\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"JIRA Guide\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". If your project is set up on JIRA (whether on the EPAM or Customer side) this part of the Handbook provides best practices and typical workflows as well as contacts of people to call for assistance.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Another part of the Handbook is the real-life Case Studies section, which reflects challenges from real project(s) and describes ways of addressing them, as well as lessons learnt.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"As the Handbook is a continuously updated source of knowledge, you are welcome to share your personal experience and join the group of contributors - just follow the steps in the\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/x/rpdYE\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Handbook Contribution Guide\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". As soon as you are added to the appropriate distribution list, you will receive updates and get access to related assets.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Last, but not the least, a set of \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMDMO/Resources+and+Templates\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Resources and Templates\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" includes a set of useful links/webinars by topics, like:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"ordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"New project creation\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Series of tutorials dedicated to project staffing\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Series of tutorials dedicated to Resource Plan management\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Project Management role duties\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Library Service\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Library Service provides access to up-to-date information on different topics. It allows you to keep up with the latest trends in the IT-industry and minimizes employees' self-education efforts. \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"http://library.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Library\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"– e-books and paper copies catalogue of the Minsk library. Links to library catalogs of other locations are available at the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"http://media.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"main page\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" and \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://evbyminsdbookz.minsk.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"here\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-5\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Submitting a Request:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This service is constantly available to all employees. E-books can be downloaded with no restrictions; paper copies can be requested by pressing «Order It” or “Get a Paper Copy” buttons in the book profile. After you press the button, a request message is automatically generated and sent to \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:WFAL@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"WFAL@epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"; you will receive a reply from the library manager within the same working day. Employees can also initiate book purchases if the book needed is not in the library catalogue. Purchase of books in EPAM branch offices is organized within the allocated budget by the Local Librarian or the Manager of the branch office. Please find more details on the library service \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMCDPSITE/Read+a+book\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"here\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Agile Library\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"http://www.agilelib.net/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Agilelib.net\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" is a library of agile-related resources built by agile practitioners, for agile practitioners. This website provides a library of books, blogs, articles, white papers, videos, slide shows, free tools, groups, community forums, and other resources that a change agent may find useful for a deeper understanding of Agile, and for his or her own personal development as an agile practitioner and coach.
